column4: hi, i've got an established vpn with pppd/pptp. how can i route all traffic over the vpn?
add a network route with route add
i figured as much, not sure what the route should be though. if i route all traffic over it, won't the packets going to the vpn server also get re-routed?
if you want to route everything over the vpn, change the default route to the vpn gateway
